short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No-frills, back to basics task list for busy professionals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tasker by Copperpod provides a simple to-do list, that allows you to add tasks and mark them as done.

Confidentiality - all data remains on your computer, for security and confidentiality.

This extension is under continuous development. Any feedback is highly welcomed and will help us in adding new features.

If you like the extension, please don't forget to rate it 5-star (preferably!) and spread the word. In case of any issues/suggestions, leave a comment at the support section.

Follow us on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/copperpod-ip/
